title.rendered: Call for Proposals: 27th Online Educa Berlin (OEB) 2021

content.rendered:
The 2021 Online Educa Berlin (OEB) will take place from Dec 1 – 3, 2021 in Berlin. The 27th edition of the global, cross-sector conference, and exhibition on technology supported learning and training could be the first on-site gathering of the international learning technology community since many conferences went virtuel due to the global pandemic. 

This year’s event is all about Learning Resilience with sub-themes addressing opportunities and challenges  that are changing the world of learning in all industries, i.e. school, higher education, workplace, and policy making. The deadline for the Call for Proposals is May 3, 2021. You can submit your idea for a proposal here. Many formats are accepted: Pre-conference workshop, interactive session, individual presentation, panel session, discovery demo, boardroom dialogue.

📢 ))) #OEB21 Call For Proposals is now OPEN!
With the main theme of Learning Resilience, if you have an interesting case-study or an idea for a compelling and innovative presentation, come & help shape the future of learning!
👇🏽https://t.co/nvOTLp9jt8 pic.twitter.com/i99bQ2ZQ2B

— OEB Conference (@OEBconference) March 5, 2021

Among the confirmed Keynote Speakers is Rose Luckin, Professor of Learner Centred Design at UCL Knowledge Lab & Director of EDUCATE Ventures Research. João Santos, the senior expert in the Directorate General for Employment, Social Affairs, and Inclusion at the European Commission in Brussels is announced to highlight the impact of VET and the EU Commission’s vision for Centres of Vocational Excellence. Also, Class Central’s Founder and CEO Dhawal Shah will contribute to the conference. His keynote address will focus on trends and developments in the MOOC landscape.

OEB’s international participants come from the entire learning ecosystem: from the education sector, workplace learning & development, governmental organisations, and EdTech solution providers. If you are new to OEB, check out the conference recordings of OEB 2020 which was held online due to the global pandemic.

This year, OEB agenda covers a wide range of subjects, including:

  • Getting to Grips with Learning Design & EdTech
  • Making Higher Education Fit for Purpose
  • Collaboration between Sectors
  • L&D’s Influence
  • The Individual in the Learning Organisation
  • Stimulating Social Connectivity
  • Reconceptualising Teaching, Training, Tutoring
  • Using Data to Accelerate Outcomes
  • Content for Good
  • Achieving Policy Aspirations

OEB 2021 at a glance

Submit your proposal: https://secretariat.oeb.global/oeb_proposals
When: Dec 1 – 3, 2021
Where: Hotel InterContinental Berlin, Budapester Str. 2, 10787 Berlin, Germany
Homepage: https://oeb.global
Stay informed: twitter, LinkedIn, Newsletter

About OEB 2021 

Online Educa Berlin (OEB) is the annual global, cross-sector conference and exhibition on digital learning and training. The event has a unique focus, bringing you to the forefront of developments in learning technology. Since 1995, insights gained at OEB have pointed the way towards the future of learning.

Class Central is a media partner for OEB 2021.
